name: website-template
description: A website template based on MFDLABS/QRefSysWeb.fx

scripts.Build-And-Run: node path.js && npm run build && npm run Start-Main-Job
scripts.RunAll: npm update && npm i && node path.js && npm run build && npm run Start-Main-Job
scripts.build-full: npm i && npm i --save-dev @types/node && node path.js && tsc -b --verbose

author: MFDLABS
